name: Omega-R
tagline: Mobile App Design and Development Services
description:
Based out of NYC, Omega-R is a digital agency that makes its mission to produce visually exceptional projects.
We design and develop innovative digital solutions with a focus on:
Mobile app solutions
UI/UX design
Responsive web
​​Omega-R works with clients all over the world to create custom-made mobile solutions for their business needs. It just happened that our clients come from different sectors and financial background. Therefore we’ve polished our skills to deliver great quality products for all of them: Startups, SME and Fortune 500 companies.
Get in touch with our Account Manager: natalie@omega-r.com
